Read 0309geomag_forecast.txt to obtain the 3-day forecast bulletin issued on 09 Mar 2025.
Use a regular-expression on the ‘Predicted Ap …’ line to capture the three forecasted Ap values (for 10-, 11-, and 12-Mar).

For each of the following files – 0311geomag_forecast.txt, 0312geomag_forecast.txt, 0313geomag_forecast.txt – read the text and, with another regex, pull out the single ‘Observed Ap’ value that each bulletin reports for the previous day (yielding the observed Ap for 10-, 11-, and 12-Mar respectively).
Assemble the three forecasted values and the three observed values.
Compute the mean absolute error (MAE) between the observed and forecasted values
